thread.title: 'Gross injustice': Of 10,000 Syrian refugees to the US, 56 are Christian
thread.title_full: 'Gross injustice': Of 10,000 Syrian refugees to the US, 56 are Christian | Fox News

author: SteelHardWorkHarder
text: "I dream of the many opportunities for free health care, financial assistance systems and quality Education in America. Since I no longer have to tend goats, I can spend all day plotting the demise of America's infrastructure, collect benefits and make more children to replace the ones I plan to sacrifice as suicide bombers so we can build a voting majority. If I am injured making a bomb, I can receive medical care and lay the bill on American tax payers." -your happy little Syrian refugee
